2134.verse: وَبِٱلْحَقِّ|And with the truth|143|158|10575$أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ|We sent it down,|134|165|5824$وَبِٱلْحَقِّ|and with the truth|142|173|10575$نَزَلَ‌ۗ|it descended.|110|141|10576$وَمَآ|And not|72|88|46$أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ|We sent you|104|134|1101$إِلَّا|except|65|125|86$مُبَشِّرًا|(as) a bearer of glad tidings|205|265|10577$وَنَذِيرًا|and a warner.|112|142|1103$

2135.verse: وَقُرْءَانًا|And the Quran|116|124|10578$فَرَقْنَـٰهُ|We have divided,|134|151|10579$لِتَقْرَأَهُۥ|that you might recite it|175|192|10580$عَلَى|to|63|80|52$ٱلنَّاسِ|the people|90|107|75$عَلَىٰ|at|63|71|52$مُكْثٍ|intervals.|81|157|10581$وَنَزَّلْنَـٰهُ|And We have revealed it|183|335|10582$تَنزِيلاً|(in) stages.|97|173|10583$

2137.verse: وَيَقُولُونَ|And they say,|113|121|3019$سُبْحَـٰنَ|"Glory be to|98|114|10207$رَبِّنَآ|our Lord!|79|95|2630$إِن|Indeed,|70|86|225$كَانَ|is|57|73|913$وَعْدُ|(the) promise|109|125|10222$رَبِّنَا|(of) our Lord|104|112|2630$لَمَفْعُولاً|surely fulfilled."|120|120|10586$

2138.verse: وَيَخِرُّونَ|And they fall|106|116|10587$لِلْأَذْقَانِ|on their faces|112|133|10585$يَبْكُونَ|weeping,|80|101|8861$وَيَزِيدُهُمْ|and it increases them|163|184|4683$خُشُوعًا ۩|(in) humility.|120|130|10588$

2139.verse: قُلِ|Say,|50|61|1922$ٱدْعُواْ|"Invoke|76|98|6460$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|74|184$أَوِ|or|41|62|1382$ٱدْعُواْ|invoke|76|98|6460$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ‌ۖ|the Most Gracious.|145|166|10589$أَيًّا مَّا|By whatever (name)|155|166|10590$تَدْعُواْ|you invoke,|96|112|10591$فَلَهُ|to Him (belongs)|129|161|10592$ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ‌ۚ|the Most Beautiful Names.|194|226|10593$وَلَا|And (do) not|105|137|25$تَجْهَرْ|be loud|74|90|10594$بِصَلَاتِكَ|in your prayers|119|132|10595$وَلَا|and not|71|98|25$تُخَافِتْ|be silent|84|111|10596$بِهَا|therein,|71|98|1203$وَٱبْتَغِ|but seek|77|104|10597$بَيْنَ|between|77|104|671$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|78|28$سَبِيلاً|a way."|72|72|3114$

2141.verse: ٱلْحَمْدُ|All Praise|79|87|5$لِلَّهِ|(is) for Allah|101|117|6$ٱلَّذِىٓ|the One Who|107|123|138$أَنزَلَ|(has) revealed|116|132|2043$عَلَىٰ|to|63|79|52$عَبْدِهِ|His slave|78|94|10602$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book,|85|93|451$وَلَمْ|and not|71|126|2566$يَجْعَل|(has) made|95|205|6017$لَّهُۥ|in it|54|164|977$عِوَجَاۜ|any crookedness.|136|191|10603$

2142.verse: قَيِّمًا|Straight,|78|84|10604$لِّيُنذِرَ|to warn|71|84|10605$بَأْسًا|(of) a punishment|138|151|4259$شَدِيدًا|severe,|74|87|2934$مِّن|from|50|63|53$لَّدُنْهُ|near Him,|82|95|4007$وَيُبَشِّرَ|and give glad tidings|156|162|10606$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|(to) the believers,|141|156|1964$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|119|20$يَعْمَلُونَ|do|92|122|912$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds,|130|160|239$أَنَّ|that|48|78|240$لَهُمْ|for them|76|91|98$أَجْرًا حَسَنًا|(is) a good reward.|147|147|10607$

2144.verse: وَيُنذِرَ|And to warn|101|131|10609$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|149|20$قَالُواْ|say,|64|124|101$ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ|"Allah has taken|126|186|1078$وَلَدًا|a son."|66|96|1079$

2134.verse: And with the truth We have sent the Qur'an down, and with the truth it has descended. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.

2135.verse: And [it is] a Qur'an which We have separated [by intervals] that you might recite it to the people over a prolonged period. And We have sent it down progressively.

2136.verse: Say, "Believe in it or do not believe. Indeed, those who were given knowledge before it - when it is recited to them, they fall upon their faces in prostration,

2137.verse: And they say, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, the promise of our Lord has been fulfilled."

2138.verse: And they fall upon their faces weeping, and the Qur'an increases them in humble submission.

2139.verse: Say, "Call upon Allah or call upon the Most Merciful. Whichever [name] you call - to Him belong the best names." And do not recite [too] loudly in your prayer or [too] quietly but seek between that an [intermediate] way.

2140.verse: And say, "Praise to Allah, who has not taken a son and has had no partner in [His] dominion and has no [need of a] protector out of weakness; and glorify Him with [great] glorification."

2141.verse: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, who has sent down upon His Servant the Book and has not made therein any deviance.

2142.verse: [He has made it] straight, to warn of severe punishment from Him and to give good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a good reward

2143.verse: In which they will remain forever

2144.verse: And to warn those who say, "Allah has taken a son."
